LanguageData.Firefoam.label: firefoam
LanguageData.Firefoam.description: Allows the construction of firefoam poppers; fire-safety buildings which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.
LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: moisture pump
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: Allows the construction of moisture pumps, which turn wet ground dry.
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: geothermal power
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: Sjuksäng
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: En säng särskilt anpassad för skadade personer. Ökar chansen för en lyckad medecinsk åtgärd.
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.label: medicine production
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.description: Produce medicine from herbal medicine, neutroamine, and cloth.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: Multianalysator
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Ökar forskningshastigheten. Måste placeras jämte en högteknologisk forskningsbänk. En forskarbänk kan länkas samman med endast en multianalysator.
